page.description: The $gs() function gets the in-line style of the passed-in element(s), and returns the CSS text.

argument.name: ELEMENT
argument.description: The element(s) with the in-line style information to retrieve. Can be a single DOM element, an element ID specified as a string, or an array of DOM Element objects. If specifying the ID as a string, the ID corresponds to the value for the id HTML attribute for the element you wish to assign a style.

page.important: Use *[link:{dialog.object}.getPointer()@ux component getpointer method]* to get the DOM element for a control.

see.ref: Using Core Library Functions in Components
